post.text: Your vote could make all the difference. Confirm where you'll cast your vote for Hillary: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: I'll be casting my vote at Lost Mountain Middle school in Kennesaw, Ga. for the first female President of the United States, Mrs. Hillary Rodham Clinton! With a huge amount of pride in doing so!

replies.author: Briana
replies.text: GO Sarah!!!! Georgia here and voting for Hillary, as well!

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: I am definitely going to have to vote for trump now that I am finding out from the news that all these things are true about her but I have always known she spins Trump's words to sound the opposite of what he said I can no longer in good conscience vote for her!

replies.author: Briana
replies.text: Funny, I saw this exact same post today and not from you. However, Clinton supporters are smart enough to look at your page and see you have always been a Trump supporter. Good try.
